Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CLIConstants

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CLIConstants
public class CLIConstants extends Object
This class contains all the constants used in the CLI.

    • ITEM_TILES_TYPES_CLI_COLORS

      protected static final Map<ItemTileType,String> ITEM_TILES_TYPES_CLI_COLORS
      It is a map that contains the association between the item tile type and the color used to print it. Used for the board, the library and the personal card.

    • ITEM_TILES_TYPES_CLI_COLORS_SMALL

      protected static final Map<ItemTileType,String> ITEM_TILES_TYPES_CLI_COLORS_SMALL
      It is a map that contains the association between the item tile type and the color used to print it. Used for the small libraries of the other players.

    • ITEM_TILES_TYPE_COLOR_LEGEND
